name: api-error-handling
description: Standardised error handling pattern for FastAPI endpoints and frontend API responses in Phase 2 Todo app
instructions: When implementing any API endpoint or frontend fetch call, ALWAYS follow this error handling pattern:

rules: Return consistent JSON shape on error:
Never leak stack traces or database errors to client

rules: Try to parse JSON error shape
